ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are grateful to Kyohei Iida, Ryu Ikeda, Yuji Eguchi, and Yoshinori Taruma (Kindai University) for helping our field sampling and survey. We would like to thank Riyo Hirasawa (Center for Ecological Research (CER), Kyoto University), Dr. Tadao Kitagawa, Dr. Kaori Kochi, Tatsunari Yamaguchi, and Makoto Kobayashi (Kindai University) for valuable technical advice in carbon and nitrogen stable isotope analyses. We are grateful to Dr. Jean Beran Tanangonan for the helpful suggestions and supports regarding this manuscript. The present study was conducted using the Cooperative Research Facilities (isotope ratio mass spectrometer) of the Center for Ecological Research, Kyoto University. Part of this study was supported by the Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS), KAKENHI Grant Nos. JP16K15080, JP19K06098, and JP20J12743.
